response.original_title: Tales from the Land of Gullah for Kids
response.overview: Hear Mother Goose stories ... Gullah style! Anita Singleton-Prather (Forrest Gump) reprises her role as Aunt Pearlie-Sue as she regales the audience with West African fables, songs and stories. This time, she's accompanied by 50 kids at her feet, singing along with her. Aunt Pearlie-Sue is keeping the oral tradition alive of passing down her heritage through song and dance.
response.title: Tales from the Land of Gullah for Kids
